title: go.tools/go/types: types are not collected for range key and value expressions
body:
Run http://play.golang.org/p/5fCME4PJB0

It prints the types for the range statement's X, Key, and Value expressions.

Want:

map[string]int
string
int

Got:

map[string]int
<nil>
<nil>

Marking as Go 1.4 because it is blocking issue #8356.
